There have been some new posts on the OOC Message board. Including the start 
of a discussion. So drop on in (the site's at http://nbwrpg.tripod.com), and 
post if you want to.

::Zardus::

Zardus smiles, looking down at the new addition to the Alliance force. THe 
reprogramming seemed to have been completeded successfully.

"For now, you will come with me to watch Lady Hawk's experiment," he says, 
turning to Lady Hawk.

"Whenever you're ready," he says to her (Lady Hawk).
